abstract.text: Main client interface for interacting with api.omg.lol within omgapi

inlineContent.text: In general all access goes through the
interface, which acts as it’s own Swift
. Models are returned by the api asyncronously, the api itself is state-less. Each function requests all the data it needs, and returns everything relevant it receives.
